bill.title: Business Registration
bill.description: To clarify and correct ambiguities and errors in Hawaii's business registration laws. (SD1)

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to CPN, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 02-03-12 9:00AM in conference room 229.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in CPN were as follows: 7 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Taniguchi, Galuteria, Green, Nishihara, Solomon, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reported from CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2041) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on on 02-23-12 9:00AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 14 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Fukunaga, Kahele, Kim, Kouchi, Ryan, Tokuda, Wakai, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2579) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 03-06-12.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 286) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) Pass First Reading
(H) Referred to ERB, CPC, FIN, referral sheet 41
(H) Re-referred to CPC, FIN, referral sheet 45
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Monday, 03-19-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Yamane, Brower, Cabanilla, Coffman, Ito, Keith-Agaran, Luke, McKelvey, Souki, Tsuji, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Herkes, Carroll, Ching.
(H) Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1179-12), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
(H) Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Chang, Herkes, Nakashima excused (3).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Monday, 04-02-12 2:00PM in House conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Riviere.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1623-12), recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 388).
(S) Enrolled to Governor.
